paragraph.content: for the purposes of, and otherwise in relation to, Divisions 7 to 10, means the duty of disclosure arising under section 341 which has to be performed in accordance with section 347;

def.name: EquityDerivatives
def.leadIn: equity derivatives (股本衍生工具) means any—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: rights, options or interests (whether described as units or otherwise) in, or in respect of, underlying shares;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: contracts, the purpose or pretended purpose of which is to secure or increase a profit or avoid or reduce a loss, wholly or partly by reference to the price or value, or a change in the price or value, of—

subparagraph.content: underlying shares; or
any rights, options or interests referred to in paragraph (a);

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: rights, options or interests (whether described as units or otherwise) in, or in respect of—

subparagraph.content: any rights, options or interests referred to in paragraph (a); or
any contracts referred to in paragraph (b); or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.leadIn: instruments or other documents creating, acknowledging or evidencing any rights, options or interests or any contracts referred to in paragraph (a), (b) or (c), including stock futures contracts, certificates of interest or participation in, temporary or interim certificates for, receipts (including depositary receipts) in respect of, or warrants to subscribe for or purchase—

subparagraph.content: underlying shares; or
the rights, options or interests or the contracts,

def.continued: whether or not—

paragraph.content: the rights, options or interests, the contracts or the instruments or documents are, where the underlying shares are shares in a listed corporation, issued or made available by the listed corporation; or

subsection.def: Exchange Company (交易所公司) means the Exchange Company within the meaning of the repealed Securities (Disclosure of Interests) Ordinance;

def.name: Founder
def.leadIn: founder (成立人), in relation to a discretionary trust, means a person who—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: has directly or indirectly provided, or undertaken to provide, property for the purpose of the trust; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: has entered into a reciprocal arrangement or understanding (whether having legal effect or not) with another person leading, directly or indirectly, to the creation of the trust, or has procured another person, directly or indirectly, to create the trust,

def.continued: and whose consent is required as a condition (whether having legal effect or not) to the exercise by any trustee of his discretion in connection with the trust property, or in accordance with whose wishes (whether having legal effect or not) any trustee is accustomed, or would be expected, to act;

subsection.def: Hong Kong register (香港登記冊), in relation to a listed corporation, means the register of members, or a branch register, of the listed corporation that is kept in Hong Kong;
inspector (審查員) means an inspector appointed under section 356 or 357;

issued voting shares (已發行的有投票權股份), in relation to a listed corporation, means the listed corporation’s issued shares of a class which carry rights to vote in all circumstances at general meetings of the corporation; (Added 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)
listed (上市) means listed on a recognized stock market;
listed corporation (上市法團) means any corporation which has any of its securities listed;
notifiable interest (須具報權益) has the meaning assigned to it by section 311(3);
notifiable percentage level (須具報百分率水平) has the meaning assigned to it by section 315(1);

off-exchange transaction (場外交易) means any transaction, arrangement or occurrence of an event (other than an on-exchange transaction) under which a person becomes, or ceases to be, interested in shares;
on-exchange transaction (場內交易) means any transaction conducted on a recognized stock market or a recognized futures market under which a person becomes, or ceases to be, interested in shares;

physically settled equity derivatives (實物結算股本衍生工具) means equity derivatives that are, or are to be, settled by delivery of the underlying shares, including equity derivatives in respect of which the holder, writer or issuer of the equity derivatives may choose to settle by payment of cash or by delivery of the underlying shares;

def.name: QualifiedLender
def.leadIn: qualified lender (合資格借出人) means a person who is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: an authorized financial institution;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: an insurer authorized under the Insurance Ordinance (Cap. 41); (Amended 12 of 2015 s. 141)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: an exchange participant of a recognized exchange company;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: an intermediary licensed or registered for Type 1 or Type 8 regulated activity; or

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.leadIn: a corporation authorized under the law of any place outside Hong Kong recognized for the purposes of section 313(13), 317(6), 323(6) or (7) or 341(5) by the Commission to carry on business—

subparagraph.content: as a bank;
as an insurance company; or
in an activity that is in the opinion of the Commission equivalent to any of the regulated activities carried on by an intermediary referred to in paragraph (d);

subsection.def: register of directors’ and chief executives’ interests and short positions (董事及最高行政人員權益及淡倉登記冊) means the register kept under section 352;

register of interests in shares and short positions (股份權益及淡倉登記冊) means the register kept under section 336 including, except where the context otherwise requires, that part of the register kept under section 337;
regulations (規例) means regulations made under section 376;

def.name: RelevantEvent
def.leadIn: relevant event (有關事件)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: for the purposes of, and otherwise in relation to, Divisions 2 to 6, means—

subparagraph.content: in a case under section 310(1)(a) or (b) or (4)(a) or (b), the event or change referred to in such section;
in a case under section 310(2)(a), the event in consequence of which the corporation becomes a listed corporation;

in a case under section 310(2)(b), the event in consequence of which the listed corporation’s shares of a particular class become voting shares; (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)
in a case under section 310(2)(c) or (5), the commencement of this Part; or
in a case under section 310(3) or (6), the taking effect of the regulation providing for the reduction referred to in such section; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: for the purposes of, and otherwise in relation to, Divisions 7 to 10, means—

subparagraph.content: in a case under section 341(1)(a), (b), (c), (d), (e) or (f), the event referred to in such section;
in a case under section 341(2)(a), the event in consequence of which the corporation becomes a listed corporation;
in a case under section 341(2)(b), the commencement of this Part;
in a case under section 341(2)(c), the event in consequence of which the person becomes a director or chief executive of a listed corporation; or
in a case under section 341(2)(d), the event in consequence of which the corporation becomes an associated corporation of a listed corporation;

subsection.def: relevant exchange company (有關交易所公司) means the Stock Exchange Company; (Replaced 6 of 2014 s. 63)
relevant time (有關時間) means the time of the occurrence of the relevant event;

rights issue (供股) means an offer or issue by a listed corporation of shares in the listed corporation (whether issued or unissued) to all persons holding issued shares in the listed corporation at a certain date (other than a person whose address is in a place where such offer or issue is not permitted under the law of that place) in proportion to the number of those issued shares held by them at that date, but does not include an offer or issue of shares in the listed corporation in lieu of all or part of a cash dividend;

def.name: ShortPosition
def.leadIn: short position (淡倉) means the position which a person has—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: where the person is the holder, writer or issuer of any equity derivatives, by virtue of which the person—

subparagraph.content: has a right to require another person to take delivery of the underlying shares of the equity derivatives;
is under an obligation to deliver the underlying shares of the equity derivatives to another person, if called upon to do so;
has a right to receive from another person an amount if the price of the underlying shares of the equity derivatives declines; or
has a right to avoid or reduce a loss if the price of the underlying shares of the equity derivatives declines,

paragraph.continued: before or on a certain date or within a certain period, whether in any case the right or obligation is conditional or absolute; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: where the person is the borrower of shares under a securities borrowing and lending agreement, by virtue of which the person is under an obligation to deliver shares to another person who has lent shares, if called upon to do so, before or on a certain date or within a certain period, whether or not the obligation to deliver shares is to be settled by payment of cash or by delivery of shares or otherwise;

subsection.def: specified percentage level (指明百分率水平) has the meaning assigned to it by section 315(2);
stock futures contract (股票期貨合約) means a contract which is of a class approved by the Commission as stock futures contracts for trading on a recognized futures market;
target corporation (目標法團), in relation to an agreement to which section 317 applies, means the particular listed corporation which is the target corporation for that agreement;

def.name: UnderlyingShares
def.leadIn: underlying shares (相關股份), in relation to any equity derivatives and subject to subsection (5), means—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: for the purposes of, and otherwise in relation to, Divisions 2 to 6—

subparagraph.content: the voting shares in the listed corporation concerned which may be required to be delivered to, or by, the holder, writer or issuer of the equity derivatives on the exercise of rights or fulfilment of obligations under the equity derivatives, whether in any case the rights or obligations are conditional or absolute; or
the voting shares in the listed corporation concerned by reference to the price or value of which, wholly or partly, the price or value of the equity derivatives is derived or determined; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: for the purposes of, and otherwise in relation to, Divisions 7 to 10—

subparagraph.content: the shares in the listed corporation concerned, or any associated corporation of the listed corporation, which may be required to be delivered to, or by, the holder, writer or issuer of the equity derivatives on the exercise of rights or fulfilment of obligations under the equity derivatives, whether in any case the rights or obligations are conditional or absolute; or

the shares in the listed corporation concerned, or any associated corporation of the listed corporation, by reference to the price or value of which, wholly or partly, the price or value of the equity derivatives is derived or determined,

paragraph.continued: whether in any case those shares are issued or unissued; (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

def.name: VotingShares
def.leadIn: voting shares (有投票權股份), in relation to a listed corporation—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: means the listed corporation’s issued voting shares; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: includes the listed corporation’s unissued shares of a class which, if issued, would carry rights to vote in all circumstances at general meetings of the corporation. (Added 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.content: The temporary suspension of voting rights in respect of shares comprised in a class of the issued shares in a listed corporation does not affect the application of this Part in relation to interests in those or any other shares comprised in that class. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

def.name: Agreement
def.leadIn: In section 317, and also in references elsewhere in this Part to an agreement to which that section applies, agreement (協議) includes any agreement or arrangement, and a reference in that section to provisions of an agreement—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: accordingly includes a reference to undertakings, expectations or understandings operative under any arrangement; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: (without prejudice to paragraph (a)) also includes a reference to any provisions, whether express or implied and whether absolute or not.

subsection.def: For the purposes of any provision of this Part which provides that an officer of a corporation who is in default is liable to a fine or penalty, the expression every officer of it who is in default (其每名違責的高級人員) means every officer of the corporation who knowingly and wilfully authorizes or permits the default, refusal or contravention referred to in that provision.

subsection.leadIn: In the case of equity derivatives—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: where—

subparagraph.content: no less than 5 listed corporations’ shares will be required to be delivered on the exercise of rights or fulfilment of obligations under the equity derivatives; and

subparagraph.leadIn: at the time of the issue of the equity derivatives, no more than—

subparagraph.name: A
subparagraph.content: subject to sub-subparagraph (B), 30%; or

subparagraph.name: B
subparagraph.content: where any other percentage is prescribed by regulations for the purposes of this subsection, such other percentage,

subparagraph.continued: of the value of all the shares which, but for this subsection, would have been the underlying shares of the equity derivatives is represented by the shares in any one of those listed corporations; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: where—

subparagraph.content: the prices or values of no less than 5 listed corporations’ shares play a part in the derivation or determination of the price or value of the equity derivatives; and

subparagraph.leadIn: at the time of the issue of the equity derivatives, no more than—

subparagraph.name: A
subparagraph.content: subject to sub-subparagraph (B), 30%; or

subparagraph.name: B
subparagraph.content: where any other percentage is prescribed by regulations for the purposes of this subsection, such other percentage,

subparagraph.continued: of the price or value of the equity derivatives is derived from or determined by the prices or values of the shares in any one of those listed corporations,

subsection.continued: those equity derivatives are taken to have no underlying shares.

subsection.leadIn: In subsection (5), a reference to shares shall be construed as—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: for the purposes of, and otherwise in relation to, Divisions 2 to 6, a reference to voting shares in the listed corporation concerned; or (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: for the purposes of, and otherwise in relation to, Divisions 7 to 10, a reference to shares in the listed corporation concerned.

subsection.content: In subsections (5) and (6), a reference to a listed corporation includes a reference to a corporation that is listed on a specified stock exchange.

section.name: s309
section.heading: Exemptions

subsection.content: The Commission may, after consultation with the Financial Secretary, publish guidelines for the exemption of any person from all or any of the provisions of this Part.

The Commission may, upon the application of a corporation, having regard to the guidelines published under subsection (1) and imposing such conditions as it considers appropriate, exempt the applicant corporation, and any other person in relation to that corporation, from all or any of the provisions of this Part.

The Commission may, upon the application of the holder, writer or issuer, or the prospective holder, writer or issuer, of any equity derivatives, having regard to the guidelines published under subsection (1) and imposing such conditions as it considers appropriate, exempt the applicant, and any other person who is taken to have an interest or short position in the underlying shares of the equity derivatives by virtue of the holding, writing or issuing of the equity derivatives, from all or any of the provisions of this Part.

subsection.leadIn: The Commission may from time to time—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: suspend or withdraw an exemption granted under subsection (2) or (3) on the ground that the conditions subject to which the exemption was granted have not been complied with or on such other ground as the Commission considers appropriate; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: amend any condition imposed under subsection (2) or (3).

subsection.content: The Commission shall publish, by the use of the Internet, such particulars of the exemptions granted, suspended or withdrawn under this section as it considers appropriate. (Amended 9 of 2012 s. 43)
Guidelines published under subsection (1) are not subsidiary legislation.

division.name: D2
division.heading: Disclosure of interests and short positions

section.name: s310
section.heading: Duty of disclosure: cases in which it may arise

subsection.leadIn: Where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person acquires an interest in, or ceases to be interested in, voting shares in a listed corporation (whether or not having or retaining an interest in other voting shares in the listed corporation); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: any change occurs affecting facts relevant to the application of section 313 to a person’s existing interest (or part thereof) in shares of any description in a listed corporation,

subsection.continued: then in the circumstances specified in section 313(1), he comes under the duty of disclosure.

subsection.leadIn: Where a person is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: interested in voting shares in a corporation at the time when the corporation becomes a listed corporation;

paragraph.name: b
c
paragraph.content: interested in voting shares in a listed corporation at the commencement of this Part, if such interest has not previously been disclosed to the listed corporation and the Exchange Company under the Securities (Disclosure of Interests) Ordinance (Cap. 396) before its repeal under section 406,

subsection.continued: then in the circumstances specified in section 313(2), he comes under the duty of disclosure.

subsection.content: Where a person is interested in voting shares in a listed corporation at the time when there is a reduction in the notifiable percentage level made by regulations, then in the circumstances specified in section 313(3), he comes under the duty of disclosure.

subsection.leadIn: Where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person comes to have, or ceases to have, a short position in voting shares in a listed corporation (whether or not having or retaining a short position in other voting shares in the listed corporation); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: any change occurs affecting facts relevant to the application of section 313 to a person’s existing short position (or part thereof) in shares of any description in a listed corporation,

subsection.continued: then in the circumstances specified in section 313(4), he comes under the duty of disclosure.

subsection.content: Where a person has a short position in voting shares in a listed corporation at the commencement of this Part, then in the circumstances specified in section 313(5), he comes under the duty of disclosure.

Where a person has a short position in voting shares in a listed corporation at the time when there is a reduction in the specified percentage level made by regulations, then in the circumstances specified in section 313(6), he comes under the duty of disclosure.
The existence of the duty of disclosure in a particular case depends (in part) on the circumstances obtaining before and after whatever is in that case the relevant time.
This section is subject to sections 151 and 153(3) of the Financial Institutions (Resolution) Ordinance (Cap. 628). (Added 23 of 2016 s. 217. Amended E.R. 2 of 2017)

section.name: s311
section.heading: Interests to be disclosed

subsection.content: Subject to subsection (2), the interests to be taken into account for the purposes of the duty of disclosure arising under section 310 are those in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned.

subsection.leadIn: In subsection (1), a reference to interests in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned includes a reference to interests in such voting shares, which are the underlying shares of equity derivatives, that a person has, or ceases to have, by virtue of— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the holding, writing or issuing by him of the equity derivatives;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the exercise by, or against, him of rights under the equity derivatives; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the assignment by him, or the lapsing without exercise, of rights under the equity derivatives.

subsection.content: A person has a notifiable interest at any time when the aggregate number of voting shares in the listed corporation concerned in which the person is interested, when expressed as a percentage of the number of issued voting shares in the listed corporation at that time, is equal to or more than the notifiable percentage level for the time being.

section.name: s312
section.heading: Short positions to be disclosed
section.content: The short positions to be taken into account for the purposes of the duty of disclosure arising under section 310 are those in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned.

section.name: s313
section.heading: Circumstances in which duty of disclosure arises

subsection.leadIn: The circumstances referred to in section 310(1) are those where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the person has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time, but did not have a notifiable interest immediately before the relevant time;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the person had a notifiable interest immediately before the relevant time, but does not have a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the person had a notifiable interest immediately before the relevant time, and has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time, but the percentage levels of his interest immediately before and immediately after the relevant time are not the same; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: the person had a notifiable interest immediately before the relevant time, and has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time, but the nature of his interest (or part thereof) immediately before and immediately after the relevant time is not the same.

subsection.content: The circumstances referred to in section 310(2) are those where the person has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time.

The circumstances referred to in section 310(3) are those where the person has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time, but did not have a notifiable interest immediately before the relevant time.

subsection.leadIn: The circumstances referred to in section 310(4) are those where the person had a notifiable interest immediately before the relevant time, and has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time, and—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: the person—

subparagraph.content: did not have a short position in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned immediately before the relevant time; or
had a short position in such voting shares immediately before the relevant time of a percentage level less than the specified percentage level,

paragraph.continued: but has a short position in such voting shares immediately after the relevant time of a percentage level equal to or more than the specified percentage level;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the person had a short position in such voting shares immediately before the relevant time of a percentage level equal to or more than the specified percentage level, but does not have a short position in such voting shares immediately after the relevant time of a percentage level equal to or more than the specified percentage level; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the person had a short position in such voting shares immediately before the relevant time of a percentage level equal to or more than the specified percentage level, and has a short position in such voting shares immediately after the relevant time of a percentage level equal to or more than the specified percentage level, but the percentage levels of his short position immediately before and immediately after the relevant time are not the same. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.content: The circumstances referred to in section 310(5) are those where the person has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time, and has a short position in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned immediately after the relevant time of a percentage level equal to or more than the specified percentage level. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: The circumstances referred to in section 310(6) are those where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the person had a notifiable interest immediately before the relevant time, and has a notifiable interest immediately after the relevant time; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the person had a short position in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned immediately before the relevant time of a percentage level less than the specified percentage level, but has a short position in such voting shares immediately after the relevant time of a percentage level equal to or more than the specified percentage level. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: A person who would otherwise come under a duty of disclosure in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(c) is not under such a duty where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the percentage level of his interest in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned, calculated in accordance with section 314(1), immediately after the relevant time is the same as or less than the percentage level of his interest in such voting shares at the time of the relevant event giving rise to the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(c); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: the difference between—

subparagraph.content: the percentage figure of his interest in such voting shares, calculated in accordance with subsection (14)(a), at all times since the relevant event giving rise to the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(c); and
the percentage figure of his interest in such voting shares disclosed in the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(c),

paragraph.continued: is less than 0.5%. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: A person who would otherwise come under a duty of disclosure in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(d) is not under such a duty where the percentage level of his interest (excluding that part of his interest the nature of which has changed immediately after the relevant time) in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned, calculated in accordance with section 314(1) (by construing the reference in that section to the aggregate number of all the voting shares in which a person is interested as a reference to the aggregate number of the voting shares the nature of the person’s interest in which has not changed), immediately after the relevant time— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is the same as the percentage level of his interest in such voting shares at the time of the relevant event giving rise to the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(a), (c) or (d) (whichever is the latest); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: is the same as or less than the percentage level of his interest in such voting shares at the time of the relevant event giving rise to the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(c), and the difference between— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subparagraph.content: the percentage figure of his interest in such voting shares, calculated in accordance with subsection (14)(a) (by construing the reference in that subsection to section 314(1) in the manner aforementioned in this subsection), at all times since the relevant event giving rise to the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(c); and
the percentage figure of his interest in such voting shares disclosed in the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (1)(c),

paragraph.continued: is less than 0.5%. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: A person who would otherwise come under a duty of disclosure in the circumstances specified in subsection (4)(c) is not under such a duty where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the percentage level of his short position in voting shares in the listed corporation concerned, calculated in accordance with section 314(4), immediately after the relevant time is the same as or less than the percentage level of his short position in such voting shares at the time of the relevant event giving rise to the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (4)(c); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: the difference between—

subparagraph.content: the percentage figure of his short position in such voting shares calculated in accordance with subsection (14)(b) at all times since the relevant event giving rise to the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (4)(c); and

the percentage figure of his short position in such voting shares disclosed in the last notification given by him where the duty of disclosure arose in the circumstances specified in subsection (4)(c),

paragraph.continued: is less than 0.5%. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: Subject to subsection (11), a qualified corporation which would otherwise come under a duty of disclosure in the circumstances specified in subsection (1) or (4) is not under such a duty if its holding company (or where its holding company is a qualified corporation of another holding company, that other holding company)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: is, at the relevant time, taken under section 316(2)—

subparagraph.content: to be interested in any voting shares in which the qualified corporation is interested; and
to have a short position in any voting shares in which the qualified corporation has a short position; and (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: accordingly complies with the duty of disclosure.

subsection.content: If a corporation ceases to be a qualified corporation of its holding company and in such circumstances the holding company is regarded as having ceased to be interested, or have a short position, in voting shares under section 316(6), the corporation is taken to have acquired that interest or come to have that short position (as the case may be). (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subsection.def: In subsections (10), (11) and (13), qualified corporation (合資格法團), in relation to a holding company, means a wholly owned subsidiary of the holding company (whether or not the holding company is itself a wholly owned subsidiary of another holding company).

subsection.leadIn: In subsection (1)(d), a reference to the nature of a person’s interest as being not the same includes a reference to a change in the nature of—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the person’s title to voting shares in the listed corporation concerned;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: any of the person’s interest whether legal or equitable in such voting shares;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: any of the person’s interest in such voting shares, which are the underlying shares of equity derivatives, on the exercise by, or against, him of rights under the equity derivatives; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: any of the person’s interest in such voting shares in such other circumstances as are prescribed by rules made under section 377 for the purposes of this section, (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.continued: but does not include a reference to a change in the nature of the person’s interest in such voting shares— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.content: on delivery of the voting shares to him, if his equitable interest in those voting shares is notifiable, or has previously been notified to the listed corporation concerned and the relevant exchange company, under any provision of this Division or Division 3 or 4;
due to a change in the terms on which rights under any equity derivatives may be exercised resulting from a change in the number of the underlying shares in issue;

paragraph.leadIn: on—

subparagraph.name: A
subparagraph.content: the exercise of rights to subscribe for voting shares granted to him as part of a rights issue; or

subparagraph.name: B
subparagraph.content: delivery of voting shares to him pursuant to a rights issue;

paragraph.content: where another person, being a qualified lender, comes to have an interest in those voting shares by way of security; or

where the person is a holding company, due to the acquisition of an interest in those voting shares by a qualified corporation of the person from another qualified corporation of the person. (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.def: subsections (7)(b) and (8)(b) and section 326(1)(b), percentage figure (百分率數字) means the percentage figure referred to in section 314(1) before rounding down, if applicable, to the next whole number; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.def: subsection (9)(b) and section 326(1)(c), percentage figure (百分率數字) means the percentage figure referred to in section 314(4) before rounding down, if applicable, to the next whole number.

section.name: s314
section.heading: Percentage level in relation to notifiable interests and short positions

subsection.def: Subject to subsections (2), (3) and (5), percentage level (百分率水平), in section 313(1)(c), (7) and (8), means the percentage figure found by expressing the aggregate number of all the voting shares in the listed corporation concerned in which the person is interested immediately before or immediately after (as the case may be) the relevant time as a percentage of the number of issued voting shares in that listed corporation and rounding that figure down, if it is not a whole number, to the next whole number.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of subsection (1) and section 311(3), where the listed corporation concerned grants to the person rights to subscribe for, or offers to the person, as part of a rights issue, voting shares, the number of issued voting shares in the listed corporation at all times from the grant or offer (as the case may be) up to the completion or termination of the rights issue (whichever is the earlier) is taken to be the aggregate of— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the number of issued voting shares in the listed corporation immediately before the grant or offer (as the case may be); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the number of new voting shares to be issued upon the completion of the rights issue.

subsection.content: In determining the aggregate number of voting shares in the listed corporation in which a person is interested for the purposes of subsection (1) and section 311(3), there shall be disregarded any short position which that person has in such voting shares which, if included in the calculation of the aggregate number of such voting shares in which the person is interested, would reduce the aggregate number of such voting shares.

subsection.def: Subject to subsection (5), percentage level (百分率水平), in sections 313(4), (5), (6) and (9), 325(3) and 326(1)(j), means the percentage figure found by expressing the aggregate number of all the voting shares in the listed corporation concerned in which the person has a short position immediately before or immediately after (as the case may be) the relevant time as a percentage of the number of issued voting shares in that listed corporation and rounding that figure down, if it is not a whole number, to the next whole number.

subsection.leadIn: Where the listed corporation’s share capital is divided into different classes of shares—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a reference in this section and section 311(3) to the aggregate number of voting shares in the listed corporation in which the person is interested or has a short position shall be construed as a reference to the aggregate number of the voting shares in each of the classes taken separately; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a reference in this section to a percentage of the number of the listed corporation’s issued voting shares is to be construed as a reference to a percentage of the number of the issued voting shares in each of the classes taken separately.

subsection.def: In subsection (2), completion (完成), in relation to a rights issue, means the issue of voting shares in the listed corporation pursuant to the rights issue.

section.name: s315
section.heading: Notifiable percentage level and specified percentage level

subsection.leadIn: A reference to notifiable percentage level in this Part shall be construed as a reference to—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: subject to paragraph (b), 5%; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: where any other percentage is prescribed by regulations for the purposes of this subsection, such other percentage,

subsection.continued: and different percentages may be prescribed in relation to corporations of different classes or descriptions.

subsection.leadIn: A reference to specified percentage level in this Part shall be construed as a reference to—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: subject to paragraph (b), 1%; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: where any other percentage is prescribed by regulations for the purposes of this subsection, such other percentage.

section.name: s316
section.heading: Notification of family and corporate interests and short positions

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of this Division and Divisions 3 and 4, a person is taken—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: to be interested in any voting shares in which his spouse, or any minor child (natural or adopted) of his, is interested; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: to have a short position in any voting shares in which his spouse, or any minor child (natural or adopted) of his, has a short position.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of this Division and Divisions 3 and 4, a person is taken—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: to be interested in any voting shares in which a corporation is interested; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: to have a short position in any voting shares in which a corporation has a short position,

subsection.continued: if—

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: that corporation or its directors are accustomed or obliged to act in accordance with his directions or instructions; or

paragraph.name: ii
paragraph.content: subject to subsection (5), he is entitled to exercise or control the exercise of one-third or more of the voting power at general meetings of that corporation.

subsection.leadIn: Where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person is entitled to exercise or control the exercise of one-third or more of the voting power at general meetings of a corporation; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: that corporation is entitled to exercise or control the exercise of any of the voting power at general meetings of another corporation (the effective voting power),

subsection.continued: then, for the purposes of subsection (2)(ii), the effective voting power is taken as exercisable by that person.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of subsections (2) and (3), a person is entitled to exercise or control the exercise of voting power if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: he has a right (whether subject to conditions or not) the exercise of which would make him so entitled; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: he is under an obligation (whether subject to conditions or not) the fulfilment of which would make him so entitled.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of subsections (2) and (3), a person is not taken—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: to be interested in any voting shares in which a corporation is interested; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: to have a short position in any voting shares in which a corporation has a short position,

subsection.continued: if—

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: that corporation is interested in those voting shares or has a short position in those voting shares (as the case may be) by reason only of its obligation or power to invest in, manage, deal in or hold interests in those voting shares on behalf of its customers in the ordinary course of its business as an investment manager, custodian or trustee;

paragraph.name: ii
paragraph.content: to the extent that the corporation has any right or power to vote in respect of those voting shares arising from or by reason of its capacity as an investment manager, custodian or trustee, such right or power is exercisable by that corporation independently without any reference to the person or any related corporation of the person; and

paragraph.name: iii
paragraph.content: when performing its functions as an investment manager, custodian or trustee, the power of that corporation to invest in, manage, deal in or hold interests in those voting shares is exercised by that corporation independently without any reference to the person or any related corporation of the person.

subsection.content: A person who is taken to be interested, or have a short position, in voting shares under subsection (2) shall be regarded as having ceased to be interested, or have a short position, in the voting shares if subsection (2)(i) or (ii) no longer applies.

subsection.leadIn: In subsection (5)—

def.name: InvestmentManager
def.leadIn: investment manager (投資經理) means—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: an intermediary licensed or registered for Type 9 regulated activity; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: a corporation which is licensed, registered or exempt in a place outside Hong Kong recognized for the purposes of this section by the Commission for an activity which is equivalent to Type 9 regulated activity,

def.continued: and is authorized to manage investments in securities for another person under a written agreement; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.def: trustee (受託人) means a corporation the principal business of which is to hold property belonging to another person under the provisions of a trust deed.

section.name: s317
section.heading: Agreement to acquire interests in particular listed corporation

subsection.leadIn: This section applies in relation to an agreement between 2 or more persons which includes provisions for the acquisition by any one or more of them of interests in voting shares in a particular listed corporation (the target corporation), if— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the agreement also includes provisions imposing obligations or restrictions on any one or more of the parties to it with respect to their use, retention or disposal of their interests in voting shares in the target corporation acquired in pursuance of the agreement (whether or not together with any other interests of theirs in the voting shares in the target corporation to which the agreement relates); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the agreement provides for the making of a loan, or the providing of security for a loan, by a controlling person or a director of the target corporation to any person on the understanding or with the knowledge that such loan (or part thereof) would be used or applied for the acquisition of an interest in voting shares in the target corporation,

subsection.continued: and an interest in voting shares in the target corporation is in fact acquired by any of the parties in pursuance of such agreement. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.content: In subsection (1)(a), a reference to the use of interests in voting shares in the target corporation shall be construed as a reference to the exercise of any rights, or of any control or influence, arising from those interests (including the right to enter into any agreement for the exercise, or for the control of the exercise, of any of those rights by another person). (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: Once any interest in voting shares in the target corporation has been acquired in pursuance of an agreement to which this section applies, this section continues to apply to the agreement irrespective of— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: whether or not any further acquisitions of interests in voting shares in the target corporation take place in pursuance of the agreement; (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: any change in the persons who are for the time being parties to it; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: any variation of the agreement,

subsection.continued: so long as the agreement continues to include provisions of any description referred to in subsection (1)(a) or (b).

subsection.content: In subsection (3), a reference to the agreement includes a reference to any agreement having effect (whether directly or indirectly) in substitution for an earlier agreement.

subsection.leadIn: In subsection (1), a reference to an agreement, in so far as subsection (1)(a) applies, does not include—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a reference to an agreement which is not legally binding unless it involves mutuality in the undertakings, expectations or understandings of the parties to it; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a reference to an agreement to underwrite or sub-underwrite any offer of voting shares in a corporation, if the agreement is confined to that purpose and any matters incidental to it. (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subsection.content: In subsection (1), a reference to an agreement, in so far as subsection (1)(b) applies, does not include a reference to an agreement under which a controlling person or a director of the target corporation makes the loan in the ordinary course of his business as a qualified lender.

def.name: ControllingPerson
def.leadIn: For the purposes of this section, controlling person (控權人士), in relation to a corporation, means a person who, either alone or with any of his associates—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: is entitled to exercise or control the exercise of not less than—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: subject to subparagraph (ii), 30%; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: where any other percentage is prescribed by rules made under section 397 for the purposes of this subsection, such other percentage,

paragraph.continued: of the voting power at general meetings of the corporation;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: has the right to nominate any of the directors of the corporation; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: has an interest in shares carrying the right to—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: veto any resolution; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: amend, modify, limit or add conditions to any resolution,

paragraph.continued: at general meetings of the corporation.

section.name: s318
section.heading: Interests of parties to agreement

subsection.content: In the case of an agreement to which section 317 applies, each party to the agreement is taken (for the purposes of the duty of disclosure) to be interested in any voting shares in the target corporation in which any other party to the agreement is interested apart from the agreement (whether or not the interest of the other party in question was acquired, or includes any interest which was acquired, in pursuance of the agreement).

For the purposes of subsection (1) and sections 319 and 326(6)(b), an interest of a party to such an agreement in voting shares in the target corporation is an interest apart from the agreement if he is interested in those voting shares otherwise than by the application of this section and section 317 in relation to the agreement. (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

Accordingly, any such interest of the party to the agreement (apart from the agreement) includes, for the purposes of subsection (1) and section 319, any interest which he is taken to have under section 316 or by the application of this section and section 317 in relation to any other agreement with respect to voting shares in the target corporation to which he is a party.

section.name: s319
section.heading: Duty of parties to agreement acting together to keep each other informed

subsection.leadIn: A person who is a party to an agreement to which section 317 applies is subject to the requirements of this section at any time when—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the target corporation is a listed corporation, and he knows it to be so;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the shares in the target corporation to which the agreement relates consist of or include voting shares in the target corporation, and he knows that to be the case; and (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: he knows the facts which make the agreement one to which section 317 applies.

subsection.leadIn: A person who is subject to the requirements of this section is under a duty to give notification to every other party to the agreement of the relevant particulars of his interest apart from the agreement (if any) in voting shares in the target corporation— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: on his first becoming subject to the requirements of this section; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: on each occurrence after that time and while he is still subject to those requirements of any event or change referred to in section 310(1), (2) or (3) (as it applies to his case otherwise than by reference to interests which he is taken to have under section 318 as applying to that agreement).

subsection.content: The relevant particulars to be notified under subsection (2) are the number of voting shares (if any) in the target corporation which the person giving the notification would be required to state as his interest if he were under the duty of disclosure with respect to that interest (apart from the agreement) immediately after the time when the duty to give notification under subsection (2) arose. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: A person who is a party to an agreement to which section 317 applies is under a duty to give notification to every other party to the agreement of his current address—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: on his first becoming subject to the requirements of this section; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: on any change in his address occurring after that time and while he is still subject to those requirements.

subsection.content: If a person is under a duty to give any notification required by this section to any other person, the notification shall be given within 3 business days after the day on which that duty arises.

section.name: s320
section.heading: Circumstances in which persons have interests or short positions in voting shares by attribution

subsection.leadIn: In sections 310 to 313—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a reference to a person acquiring an interest in, or ceasing to be interested in, voting shares in a listed corporation includes a reference to his becoming or ceasing to be interested in those voting shares by virtue of another person’s interest;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a reference to the nature of a person’s interest in voting shares in a listed corporation as being not the same includes a reference to a change in the nature of his interest in those voting shares by virtue of a change in the nature of another person’s interest; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: a reference to a person coming to have a short position in, or ceasing to have a short position in, voting shares in a listed corporation includes a reference to his coming to have or ceasing to have a short position in those voting shares by virtue of another person’s short position. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: Subsection (1) applies where—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person becomes or ceases to be interested in voting shares in a listed corporation;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the nature of a person’s interest in such voting shares changes; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: a person comes to have or ceases to have a short position in such voting shares, (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.continued: under section 316 or 318 (as the case may be) whether—

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: by virtue of the fact that the other person who is interested, or has a short position, in those voting shares becomes or ceases to be a person by reference to whose interests or short positions (if any) he is taken to have an interest or short position (as the case may be) under section 316 or 318;

paragraph.name: ii
paragraph.content: in consequence of the fact that the other person has become or ceased to be interested in those voting shares, the nature of the other person’s interest in those voting shares has changed, or the other person has come to have or ceased to have a short position in those voting shares (as the case may be);

paragraph.name: iii
paragraph.content: in consequence of the fact that he himself becomes or ceases to be a party to an agreement to which section 317 applies to which the other person interested in those voting shares is for the time being a party; or

paragraph.name: iv
paragraph.content: in consequence of the fact that an agreement to which both he and the other person are parties becomes or ceases to be one to which section 317 applies.

subsection.leadIn: Upon—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person becoming or ceasing to be interested in voting shares in a listed corporation;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a change in the nature of a person’s interest in such voting shares; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: a person coming to have or ceasing to have a short position in such voting shares, (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.continued: (as the case may be) in the circumstances specified in subsection (2), the person shall be deemed to know that he has acquired an interest in those voting shares or has ceased to be interested in those voting shares, or that the nature of his interest in those voting shares has changed, or that he has come to have a short position in those voting shares or has ceased to have a short position in those voting shares (as the case may be), when he knows both— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: the relevant facts with respect to the other person’s interest or short position (as the case may be) in those voting shares; and

paragraph.name: ii
paragraph.content: the relevant facts by virtue of which he himself has become or ceased to be interested, or come to have or ceased to have a short position (as the case may be) in those voting shares under section 316 or 318.

subsection.leadIn: A person has the knowledge referred to in subsection (3)(i) if he knows (whether contemporaneously or not) either—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: of the fact that the other person is interested in those voting shares, or the nature of the other person’s interest in those voting shares changes, or the other person has a short position in those voting shares (as the case may be) at any material time; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: of the fact that the other person has become or ceased to be interested in those voting shares, or the nature of the other person’s interest in those voting shares has changed, or the other person has come to have or ceased to have a short position in those voting shares (as the case may be) at any material time.

subsection.leadIn: A person shall be deemed to know of the fact that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the other person is interested in those voting shares or the nature of the other person’s interest in those voting shares changes (as the case may be); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the other person has become or ceased to be interested in those voting shares or the nature of the other person’s interest in those voting shares has changed (as the case may be),

subsection.continued: if he has been notified under section 319 of facts which indicate that the other person is or has become or ceased to be interested in those voting shares or the nature of the other person’s interest in those voting shares changes or has changed (as the case may be), whether on the other person’s own account or by virtue of a third party’s interest in them.

subsection.def: In subsection (4), material time (關鍵時間) means any time at which the interests or short positions (as the case may be) of the person concerned which are taken to be his under section 316 or 318 fall or fell to be so taken.

section.name: s321
section.heading: Notification by agents
section.leadIn: Where a person authorizes another person (the agent)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: to acquire or dispose of, on his behalf, interests in voting shares in a listed corporation; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: to have or cease to have, on his behalf, short positions in such voting shares,

section.continued: he shall secure that the agent notifies him immediately of acquisitions or disposals of interests, or having or ceasing to have short positions, effected by the agent which will or may give rise to any duty of disclosure or any duty to give notification under any provision of this Division or Division 3 or 4 with respect to his interests or short positions in those voting shares.

division.name: D3
division.heading: Interests and short positions to be notified or disregarded

section.name: s322
section.heading: Interests and short positions to be taken into account for the purpose of notification

subsection.content: This section applies, subject to section 323, in determining for the purposes of Divisions 2, 4 and 5 whether a person has, or ceases to have, an interest or short position in voting shares in a listed corporation that is notifiable. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

A reference to an interest in voting shares shall be construed as including a reference to an interest of any kind whatsoever in the voting shares, and for that purpose any restraint or restriction to which the exercise of a right attached to the interest may be subject shall be disregarded.

In construing a reference to a short position in voting shares, any restraint or restriction to which the exercise of a right or the settlement of an obligation, by virtue of the short position, may be subject shall be disregarded.

subsection.leadIn: Where property is held on trust and an interest, or short position, in voting shares is comprised in that property— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a beneficiary of the trust who apart from this section does not have an interest, or short position, in the voting shares is taken to have such an interest or short position (as the case may be); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in the case of a discretionary trust, the founder of the trust is taken to have an interest or short position (as the case may be) in the voting shares.

subsection.leadIn: A person is taken to have an interest in voting shares if— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: he enters into a contract for their purchase by him (whether for cash or other consideration); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: he is entitled to—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: exercise any right conferred by the holding of the voting shares; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: control the exercise of any such right.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of subsection (5)(b), a person is taken to be entitled to exercise or control the exercise of any right conferred by the holding of voting shares if— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: he has a right (whether subject to conditions or not) the exercise of which would make him so entitled; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: he is under an obligation (whether subject to conditions or not) the fulfilment of which would make him so entitled.

subsection.leadIn: A person is taken to have an interest in voting shares if, otherwise than by virtue of having an interest under a trust— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: he has a right to subscribe for the voting shares or call for delivery of the voting shares to himself or to his order; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: he has a right to acquire an interest in the voting shares or is under an obligation to take delivery of the voting shares,

subsection.continued: whether in any case the right or obligation is conditional or absolute.

subsection.leadIn: A person who is the holder, writer or issuer of equity derivatives is taken to have an interest in voting shares which are the underlying shares of the equity derivatives if, by virtue of his holding, writing or issuing of the equity derivatives— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: he has a right to require another person to deliver the underlying shares to him;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: he is under an obligation to take delivery of the underlying shares;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: he has a right to receive from another person an amount if the price of the underlying shares increases; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: he has a right to avoid or reduce a loss if the price of the underlying shares increases,

subsection.continued: before or on a certain date or within a certain period, whether in any case the right or obligation is conditional or absolute.

subsection.leadIn: The number of voting shares in which a person is taken to be interested under subsection (8) is— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: the number of the underlying shares of the equity derivatives—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: which he has a right to require another person to deliver to him; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: of which he is under an obligation to take delivery;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the number of the underlying shares of the equity derivatives by reference to which, wholly or partly, the amount which he has a right to receive or the loss which he has a right to avoid or reduce, by virtue of his holding, writing or issuing of the equity derivatives, is derived or determined; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: in the case of a stock futures contract, the contract multiplier which is to be used in calculating the amount he may receive in respect of his holding of the stock futures contract,

subsection.continued: whether in any case the right or obligation is conditional or absolute. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: A person shall be regarded as having ceased to be interested in voting shares if— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: he delivers the voting shares to another person or to another person’s order— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: in accordance with a contract under which he agreed to sell the voting shares to the other person;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: in fulfilling an obligation to do so when called upon by the other person to deliver the voting shares; or

subparagraph.name: iii
subparagraph.content: pursuant to a right to require the other person to take delivery of the voting shares;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: his right to subscribe for or call for delivery of the voting shares lapses or he assigns such a right to another person;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: his obligation to take delivery of the voting shares lapses or he assigns such an obligation to another person; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: he receives from another person an amount, or avoids or reduces a loss, on assignment or settlement of any cash settled equity derivatives.

subsection.leadIn: The number of voting shares in which a person is regarded as having ceased to be interested under subsection (10)(d) is— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the number of the underlying shares which are to be used in calculating the amount he may receive, or the loss he may avoid or reduce; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in the case of a stock futures contract, the contract multiplier which is to be used in calculating the amount he may receive in respect of his holding of the stock futures contract. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.leadIn: The number of voting shares in which a person is regarded as having a short position by virtue of his holding, writing or issuing of any equity derivatives is— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the number of the underlying shares of the equity derivatives which he is entitled, or may be required, to deliver;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in the case of cash settled equity derivatives, the number of the underlying shares which are to be used in calculating the amount he may receive, or the loss he may avoid or reduce; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: in the case of a stock futures contract, the contract multiplier which is to be used in calculating the amount he may receive in respect of his holding of the stock futures contract. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.content: The number of voting shares in which a person is regarded as having a short position under a securities borrowing and lending agreement is the number of voting shares which he is obliged to deliver under the securities borrowing and lending agreement, if called upon to do so, whether or not the obligation to deliver voting shares may be settled by payment of cash or by delivery of voting shares or otherwise. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)
Persons having a joint interest or short position are taken each of them to have that interest or short position (as the case may be).
It is immaterial that voting shares in which a person has an interest or short position are unidentifiable.

section.name: s323
section.heading: Interests and short positions to be disregarded for the purpose of notification

subsection.leadIn: The following interests, and short positions, in voting shares in a listed corporation shall be disregarded for the purposes of Divisions 2 to 4— (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: where property is held on trust and an interest in voting shares is comprised in that property— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: an interest in reversion or remainder;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: an interest of a bare trustee; and

subparagraph.name: iii
subparagraph.content: any discretionary interest;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: an exempt custodian interest;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: subject to subsection (4), an interest in voting shares comprised in the property under— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: a collective investment scheme authorized under section 104;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: a pension scheme or a provident fund scheme registered under section 21 or 21A of the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Ordinance (Cap. 485); or

subparagraph.name: iii
subparagraph.content: a qualified non-Hong Kong scheme, (Amended 31 of 2025 s. 168)

paragraph.continued: of a holder, trustee or custodian of the scheme;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.leadIn: an interest of a person subsisting by virtue of—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: a charitable scheme made by order of any court of competent jurisdiction; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the vesting of a deceased’s estate in any judicial officer between the time of death of the deceased and the grant of letters of administration;

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.leadIn: an interest for the life of himself, or of another, of a person under a settlement in the case of which the property comprised in the settlement consists of or includes voting shares, and the following conditions are satisfied— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the settlement is irrevocable; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the settlor has no interest in any income arising under, or property comprised in, the settlement;

paragraph.name: f
paragraph.content: an exempt security interest;

paragraph.name: g
paragraph.content: an interest in voting shares of a recognized clearing house; (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: h
paragraph.content: an interest in voting shares of the Registrar of the High Court held in his official capacity; (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.leadIn: an interest in voting shares of an intermediary licensed or registered for Type 1 regulated activity where— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the interest is acquired by the intermediary as an agent only for the purposes of a transaction entered into in the ordinary course of his business as such an intermediary;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the principal in that transaction is a person other than a related corporation of the intermediary;

subparagraph.name: iii
subparagraph.content: the interest is acquired from a person other than a related corporation of the intermediary; and

subparagraph.name: iv
subparagraph.content: the intermediary has been interested in the voting shares for not more than 3 business days; (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: j
paragraph.content: such interests or interests of such a class, or such short positions or short positions of such a class, as are prescribed by regulations for the purposes of this section; and

paragraph.name: k
paragraph.content: subject to section 377, such interests or interests of such a class, or such short positions or short positions of such a class, as are prescribed by rules made under section 377 for the purposes of this section.

subsection.leadIn: A person is not taken to be interested in voting shares under section 322(5)(b) by reason only that he— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: has been appointed as a proxy to vote at a specified meeting of the listed corporation or of any class of its members and at any adjournment of that meeting; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: has been appointed by a corporation to act as its representative at a meeting of the listed corporation or of any class of its members.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of subsection (1)(b), an interest in voting shares is an exempt custodian interest if— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: it is held by a corporation which carries on a business of holding securities in custody for another person, whether on trust or by contract; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the corporation has no authority to exercise discretion in dealing in the interest, or in exercising rights attached to the interest.

subsection.content: An interest in voting shares of a holder, trustee or custodian of a scheme referred to in subsection (1)(c)(i), (ii) or (iii), comprised in the property under the scheme, shall not be disregarded under subsection (1)(c) if the holder, trustee or custodian (as the case may be) is also a manager of the scheme. (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

def.name: QualifiedOverseasScheme
def.leadIn: For the purposes of subsection (1)(c), qualified non-Hong Kong scheme (合資格非香港計劃) means a collective investment scheme, pension scheme or provident fund scheme which— (Amended 31 of 2025 s. 168)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is established in a place outside Hong Kong recognized for the purposes of this section by the Commission by notice published in the Gazette; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is authorized by or registered with the authority (if any) responsible for the authorization or registration of such scheme in the place where it is established, and complies with the requirements of such authority,

def.continued: but does not include—

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: an arrangement operated by a person otherwise than by way of business;

paragraph.name: ii
paragraph.content: an arrangement under which less than 100 persons hold, or have the right to become holders of, interests (whether described as units or otherwise) that entitle the holders, directly or indirectly, to the income or property of the arrangement;

paragraph.name: iii
paragraph.content: an arrangement under which less than 50 persons hold, or have the right to become holders of, interests (whether described as units or otherwise) that entitle the holders, directly or indirectly, to 75% or more of the income or property of the arrangement; and

paragraph.name: iv
paragraph.content: such other arrangement as may be specified by the Commission by notice published in the Gazette.

subsection.content: An interest in voting shares is an exempt security interest for the purposes of subsection (1)(f) if it is held by a qualified lender by way of security only for the purposes of a transaction entered into in the ordinary course of his business as such a qualified lender. (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subsection.leadIn: An interest in voting shares shall cease to be an exempt security interest for the purposes of subsection (1)(f), and the qualified lender holding the interest in the voting shares by way of security shall be taken to have acquired that interest for the purposes of Divisions 2 to 5, when— (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: the qualified lender—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: becomes entitled to exercise voting rights in respect of the interest in the voting shares held as security as a result of, or following, a default by the person giving the interest in the voting shares as security; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.leadIn: has—

subparagraph.name: A
subparagraph.content: evidenced an intention to exercise the voting rights or control their exercise; or

subparagraph.name: B
subparagraph.content: taken any step to exercise the voting rights or control their exercise; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the power of sale in respect of the interest in the voting shares held as security becomes exercisable, and the qualified lender or its agent offers the interest in the voting shares held as security, or any part of that interest, for sale. (Amended 19 of 2015 s. 2)

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of subsection (1), a person shall not be considered as not being a bare trustee in respect of any property by reason only that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the person for whose benefit the property is held is not absolutely entitled thereto as against the trustee only because he is a minor or is a person under a disability; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the trustee has the right to resort to the property to satisfy any outstanding charge or lien or for the payment of any duty, tax, cost or other outgoings.

subsection.content: A notice published pursuant to subsection (5)(a) or (iv) is not subsidiary legislation.

section.name: s324
section.heading: Notification to be given

subsection.leadIn: Where a person comes under a duty of disclosure under section 310, he shall give notification to the listed corporation concerned and to the relevant exchange company of—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the interests which he has, or ceases to have, in voting shares in the listed corporation; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the short position (if any) which he has, or ceases to have, in such voting shares. (Amended 28 of 2012 ss. 912 & 920 and L.N. 162 of 2013)

subsection.content: A notification required by this section shall be given to the listed corporation concerned and the relevant exchange company at the same time or (if it is not practicable to do so) one immediately after the other.

subsection.leadIn: The Commission may, by notice published in the Gazette, specify the form in respect of a notification required by this section, either generally or in any particular case, and, without limiting the generality of the foregoing, may in the form—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notwithstanding section 397(1), include directions and instructions relating to the manner in which the form is to be completed, signed, executed and authenticated; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: specify documents by which it is to be accompanied.

subsection.content: For the purposes of subsection (3), the Commission may specify any form by referring in a notice published in the Gazette to the form as separately published by such electronic means as the Commission considers appropriate, instead of setting out the form in a notice published in the Gazette, whereupon the Commission shall for all purposes be regarded as having duly specified the form under subsection (3).
For the purposes of subsection (3), the Commission may specify that different forms are to be used in different circumstances.
